body_html:
I made a fresh ubuntu user account and did the minimal install necessary to get my python/pytorch environment setup. I installed pytorch with pip, not from source.

The issue doesn't happen anymore!

A couple of other people at school said this problem with orthogonal_ has happened to them too in the past. I'll close it for now but will see if I can track down the problem on the user account where it's broken.

Thanks!

body:
I made a fresh ubuntu user account and did the minimal install necessary to get my python/pytorch environment setup. I installed pytorch with pip, not from source. 

The issue doesn't happen anymore! 

A couple of other people at school said this problem with orthogonal_ has happened to them too in the past. I'll close it for now but will see if I can track down the problem on the user account where it's broken.

Thanks!
